chart.title: Annual CO₂ emissions from deforestation for food production
chart.subtitle: Tonnes of CO₂ emissions linked to deforestation for food production – it is trade-adjusted, to reflect the carbon footprint of diets within a given country. Based on the annual average over the period from 2010 to 2014.
chart.note: Trade adjustment means that deforestation linked to the production of imported food products is added to a country's total; exported emissions are subtracted from its total.
